name: Tricky Mining
description:
Tricky Mining

This game was made for a school challenge: build a game in 3 hours. This is a polished version of the prototype with more levels. The goal is to collect the gold and bring it back to your house. You can alter the terrain by planting bombs wich will destroy neighbouring tiles. Make sure not to blow up too much of the level!

Controls:

Walking: ←, → / a ,d

Jumping: Space / ↑ / w

Place bomb: Enter / ↓ / s

Reset: Backspace / Esc
